        public boolean isOurTurn()
        Check if it is client's turn.
        Returns:
        (ourTurn == currentTurn);
        Ensures
        (ourturn == 1) || (ourturn == 0);

        public void createConnection()
                      throws ExitProgram
        Creates a new connection to a server by getting the IP and the port from the user.
        Throws:

        Ensures
        connection is created or exception is thrown

      • closeConnection

        public boolean closeConnection​(boolean canCancel)
        For properly closing the connection with the server and resetting the variables.
        Parameters:
        canCancel - - If the user is able to cancel, it should be asked to
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successfully closed
        Ensures
        variables are reset, connection with server is closed, ServerHandler equals null

      • doHello

        public void doHello()
             throws ServerUnavailableException
        Sends the Hello command to the server.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - is thrown when cannot find the server
        Ensures
        Hello is send to the server with the name of this client

      • handleHello

        public void handleHello​(java.lang.String serverReply)
                 throws ProtocolException
        Handles the Hello command sent by the server correctly.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - the message the server sent to the serverhandler
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - - if the protocol is not respected
        Ensures
        the protocol is checked

      • doLogin

        public void doLogin​(java.lang.String userName)
             throws ServerUnavailableException
        Sends the Login command to the server with the user name.
        Parameters:
        userName - - The name of the user (can be "")
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - is thrown when cannot find the server
        Ensures
        if name.equals("") the name of the user is asked

      • handleLogin

        public void handleLogin​(java.lang.String serverReply)
        Handles the Login command and the ALREADYLOGGGEDIN command sent by the server.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - The message the server sent to the server handler
        Ensures
        if login successfully boolean loggedIn = true, if login unsuccessfully (name is already in use) the user is asked to try again with a different one

      • doList

        public void doList()
            throws ServerUnavailableException
        Sends the server the List command.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - is thrown when cannot find the server
        Requires
        the user is logged in at a server

      • handleList

        public void handleList​(java.lang.String serverReply)
        Handles the List with user names send by the server.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - the text the server sent to the client handler
        Ensures
        every name is printed out for the user

      • doQueue

        public void doQueue()
             throws ServerUnavailableException
        Sends the queue command to the server.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - is thrown when cannot find the server
        Requires
        the user is logged in at a server
        Ensures
        if the user is already in the queue, it is asked if the user wants to leave

      • handleNewGame

        public void handleNewGame​(java.lang.String serverReply)
        A new game is started with the given board.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - the command + board created by the server
        Ensures
        a board is created with the given numbers

      • doMove

        public void doMove()
            throws ServerUnavailableException
        The move chosen is send to the server.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - is thrown when cannot find the server
        Ensures
        the move(s) is/are sent to the server.

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove​(java.lang.String serverReply)
                throws ServerUnavailableException
        Handle the move send by the server.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - the command + move sent to the server handler
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - - when the server disconnected
        Ensures
        the game is updated with this move

      • handleGameOver

        public void handleGameOver​(java.lang.String serverReply)
        Handle the GAMEOVER send by the server.
        Parameters:
        serverReply - - the command + reason send to the server handler
        Requires
        serverReply != null;

        This method starts a new CollectoClient.
        Parameters:
        args - - input argument
